about_the_game:
YawVR GameLink: Bridge the Gap Between Your Simulator and Your Games

YawVR GameLink is the ultimate software solution that connects your YawVR motion simulator to PC games, delivering a fully immersive and customizable experience. Designed with precision and compatibility in mind, GameLink ensures you feel every moment of the action in your favorite titles.

Core Features:

  • Seamless Integration: Effortlessly connect your YawVR motion simulator with PC games for a synchronized experience that brings your games to life.

  • Customizable Motion Settings: Fine-tune how game data translates into simulator movements. Adjust the intensity and style of motion for each game to suit your preferences.

  • Broad Compatibility: Supports a wide range of game genres, from racing and flight simulators to fully immersive VR adventures.

  • Enhanced VR Experience: Works seamlessly with Infuse VR, available on Steam, to deliver a complete and enriched VR gaming experience.

Whether you're racing, flying, or exploring virtual worlds, YawVR GameLink gives you total control over your motion settings while amplifying immersion. Pair it with Infuse VR to unlock the full potential of your YawVR simulator and dive into the ultimate VR gaming service.

Discover more and elevate your gaming experience with YawVR GameLink!

Seamlessly integrates with Infuse VR for a full VR experience, bringing unmatched realism and control to your gaming adventures.
